channel.title: [PI] More PK points per kill
channel.description:
Well i'm having one PK-point per kill which is very slow due to items in the PKP shop being fairly high, And i've been keep looking for the code that i should change but with no results, also google isn't solving my problems too.
So i'll hope you know about PI and stuff like this so you can help me out.

item.title: [PI] More PK points per kill
item.dc:creator: @RampageDesigns RampageDesigns
item.description:
@RampageDesigns wrote:

First off you might want to go to the file where it is. Find the number alter it. Save it. Then Reopen the file and if it saved all you have to do is compile
